meaningMnemonic: A <radical>sick</radical> stick of <radical>dynamite</radical> is going to be <kanji>sick</kanji> forever. Unfortunately there are no medicines that are effective on sticks of dynamite, so once they contract a sickness, they’re sick for good.
readingMnemonic: Being nervous all the time about spontaneously exploding would probably make you sweat profusely. And you know what sweating causes? <reading>B.O.</reading> (びょう). You’d be one smelly stick of dynamite. B.O. is a very unpleasant smell, and being <kanji>sick</kanji> is no excuse.
